attributes.action: Rapidly reduce and eventually stop immigration into England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The population of England is out of control and tensions are running high. I propose that we significantly reduce and eventually stop immigration into England to stabilise our population. This should not be discriminatory and encompass all nationalities.Those with genuine family already here should be considered in each case. Once a more acceptable level has been reached, sensible levels of immigration can resume.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
